Name: Martinot
Review Text: The ambiance of the place is incredible, it is located very close to Van Gogh museum. The food was incredible, home made hummus and a wide variety of plates to try. I can totally recommend this place, for more reasons, one the quality and quantity of food, two the quality of service and thirdly the vibe of the place.

Name: Martinot

Name: Martinot
Review Text: I really have to give this place a 5 star. I‚Äôve always loved smaller cafes and this place is top notch. The pizza is out of this world and the freshly ground and prepared coffee was top notch. I loved the ambience and the environment. Such ‚Ä¶

Name: Martinot

Name: Martinot
Review Text: Very delicious, but the smiling service of the waitress makes my day.

Review Text: It is unique place! The best and delicious food that you can find around Amsterdam. The place makes you feel like home. The staff, the owner and the chefs make you feel so welcome and warm! It is such a beautiful place it is definitely worth a visit! It is my to go place anytime!
